label: DeliveryTerms
comment: Conditions agreed upon between the parties with regard to the delivery of goods and or services for trade purposes.

objectProperties.comment: The code specifying the delivery discontinuation for this trade delivery terms.
The code specifying the type of delivery for these trade delivery terms.
A code specifying a function of these trade delivery terms.
A textual description of these trade delivery terms.
The indication of whether or not these trade delivery terms allow a partial delivery.
The trade location relevant for these trade delivery terms.

referencedBy.comment: Delivery terms specified for this supply chain consignment.
